clean_data: Information Resource Manager Information Resource Manager Information Resources Manager Dallas TX Over the last 20 years I have continuously focused on learning best practices from user interface and interaction to understanding workflows and knowledge sharing The wisdom gained from nonstop learning has lead me to a greater respect and understanding of Lean Six Sigma As a project manager and frontend architect it has been awesome to see our product quality increase by 36 while increasing efficiency by nearly 72 Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Information Resource Manager UT Southwestern Medical Center Dallas TX January 2019 to Present SCRUM master for a team of 8 Project development manager oversee the creation of all projects after coordinating with the project coordinator and product owner to ensure delivery Assist with 13 mil budget planning and resource allocation Senior Frontend Developer UT Southwestern Medical Center Dallas TX August 2015 to December 2018 SummaryAs a frontend architect and developer I took the challenge of researching and implementing within 2 years the first ever UTSouthwestern adaptiveresponsive frontend framework It has successfully served over 100000 pageCMSand more than 100 different website including landing pages and the overall core UTSouthwestern web interface With it also brought a 95 percent passing for accessibility including usability and performance Research Compared frameworks to understand their individual learning curves aswellas flexibility to serve the institutional needs Accomplishment reduced development time increased quality support outdated browsers and be modern friendly improved accessibility which includes usability and performance Website Email Developed hundreds of websites serving more than 100000 pages while reducing the number of templates from over 50 to only 10 Researched and implemented the power of Foundation for Email framework Accomplishment create an accessible first websites using adaptiveresponsive approach for improved device performance and usability Reduced development time by more than 70 percent and provided emails that work in most email platforms and clients Leadership I have overseen 4 developers which had never worked within a frontend framework or preprocessing environment Accomplishment guaranteed my team is trained on the proper testing coding and development techniques and provide code reviews before merging code for production Team collaboration Work with backend developers to implement a better and more efficient build process that helps reduce deployment time and risk by more than 20 percent Accomplishment Coordinating between each core area design backend development system management content contributors and digital marketinganalytics to successfully deliver web experiences that improve the quality of life for UTSouthwestern students faculty and patients Supervisory skills Assist with daily SCRUMs tasks creation and delegation Assisted in the interview process for the hiring of frontend developers by testing their understanding and knowledge of HTML CSS JavaScript frameworks and accessibility Fulfilling approximately 500 monthly maintenance request including but not limited to the following Channel creation Content coding support User account management Crash logs and republishing Accomplishment helped fulfill projects and task request with a 98 percent success rate Frontend Web Developer UT Southwestern Medical Center Dallas TX February 2013 to August 2015 Successfully planned projects for research design frontend and backend development plus deployed with a 90 percent ontime completion rate Frontend architect developed the HTML CSS and JavaScript framework based on Foundation for Sites Enhanced accessibility using the proper ARIA roles and checking for proper content layout Reduced load time by 110 percent by limiting the number of server calls and reduced bloated code Improved user experience by creating adaptiveresponsive web sites which lead to a drop in bounce rate by almost 40 percent Team participant in implementing a strategic SEO and SEM plan to boost UT Southwestern awareness and drive higher conversion for the physicians Supportive leader in the movement for responsive web development to improve accessibility for all patients and staff at UT Southwestern no matter the device Fluent in using Alfresco content management system to maintain and build web pages for UT Southwestern Build and track SEO monthly reports for over 10 campaignssites plus manage more than 500 keywords monthly Assist in properly configuring and optimizing all 19000 pages for SEO Implement SEOMOZ and CrazyEgg tools to better assist in understanding UT Southwestern users base Manage and correct any crawl errors Verify optimization for desired keywords Successfully garnished branding and updates for more than 100 plus locations using
